item.title: Version 1.2.2
item.description: - Less complex QR codes are now being generated. - A driver can now accept more than one hop-in customer by scanning additional QR codes. - The logic for how the “no thanks button” works has been updated. - The layout of the “No vehicle button” has been changed - The support part has been completely redesigned. - A message notification/button is now shown on the home screen. - The icon that shows the current location has been updated.
